 2013-13232013-12-03232010IC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActAn Act to promote the efficiency and adaptability of the Canadian economy by regulating certain activities that discourage reliance on electronic means of carrying out commercial activities, and to amend the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission Act, the Competition Act, the Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act and the Telecommunications Act
SubjectOrder Fixing Certain Dates as the Days on which Certain Provisions of the Act Come into Force
PrecisOrder fixing July 1, 2014, January 15, 2015 and July 1, 2017 as the days on which certain provisions of AN ACT TO PROMOTE THE EFFICIENCY AND ADAPTABILITY OF THE CANADIAN ECONOMY BY REGULATING CERTAIN ACTIVITIES THAT DISCOURAGE RELIANCE ON ELECTRONIC MEANS OF CARRYING OUT COMMERCIAL ACTIVITIES, AND TO AMEND THE CANADIAN RADIO-TELEVISION AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS COMMISSION ACT, THE COMPETITION ACT, THE PERSONAL INFORMATION PROTECTION AND ELECTRONIC DOCUMENTS ACT AND THE TELECOMMUNICATIONS ACT, chapter 23 of the Statutes of Canada, 2010, COME INTO FORCE.
AttachmentsAttachment
